channel.title: 2021-04-17 Social CG Meeting
channel.description:
I’m trying to show up more for these meetings. It’s hard for me to keep up to date on the daily, but once a week is literally the least I can do.
I think I did the right thing in trying to join [this telecom link](https://bbb.w3c.social/b/rhi-vp1-fv6-vn7), but haven’t managed to connect with anyone. Perhaps next time.
There are several places I looked for meeting links: * https://www.w3.org/wiki/SocialCG#Meetings <— this seems relatively up to date * https://denof.theoccasionoctopus.net/a/w3_social_web_incubator_community_group/event/details/f310a0d4-899b-4563-9356-12e0479cafc5
Brainstorms (can inform resolutions/actions): * Add some link about ‘Meetings’ to https://www.w3.org/community/SocialCG/ -> https://www.w3.org/wiki/SocialCG#Meetings * Anyone that gets to the [socialcg page](https://www.w3.org/community/SocialCG/) may try to join the mumble server, which is one of the newest (if not new) posts on the CG page * BLOCKER: (for me) HOWTO update the SocialCG page with latest meeting link. @rhiaro any ideas on how to do this, or who might know?
Resolutions: * Resolving ‘what is the primary issue tracker that the SocialCG should treat as a job queue? https://github.com/swicg/general/issues/27

item.title: 2021-04-17 Social CG Meeting
item.dc:creator: bengo
item.description:
Highlighting some interesting (to me) happenings recently:

  • Webinar with the European Commission and AP Community - #31 by j8ter
  • “ActivityPub for Administrations” - @CristinaDeLisle
  • “From Silo-first to Task-oriented Federatd App Design”

Read full topic

item.title: 2021-04-17 Social CG Meeting
item.dc:creator: bengo
item.description:
I’m trying to show up more for these meetings. It’s hard for me to keep up to date on the daily, but once a week is literally the least I can do.

I think I did the right thing in trying to join this telecom link, but haven’t managed to connect with anyone. Perhaps next time.

There are several places I looked for meeting links:

  • SocialCG - W3C Wiki <— this seems relatively up to date
  • Welcome! - Den of The Occasion Octopus

Brainstorms (can inform resolutions/actions):

  • Add some link about ‘Meetings’ to Social Web Incubator Community Group → SocialCG - W3C Wiki
    • Anyone that gets to the socialcg page may try to join the mumble server, which is one of the newest (if not new) posts on the CG page
    • BLOCKER: (for me) HOWTO update the SocialCG page with latest meeting link. @rhiaro any ideas on how to do this, or who might know?

Resolutions:

  • Resolving ‘what is the primary issue tracker that the SocialCG should treat as a job queue? RESOLUTION: This is currently the primary issue tracker for SWICG · Issue #27 · swicg/general · GitHub

Read full topic
